item.title: Apple iPhone 17 Air Latest: New Leak Reveals Design Upgrade

item.title: 3 Ways To Raise Patient Kids In An Instant-Fix World—By A Psychologist
item.description: The best parenting does not remove obstacles—it teaches children how to climb over them with patience and persistence.

item.title: Amazon Slashes Google Pixel 9 Price In Major New Sale
item.description: Amazon has knocked 19% off the Google Pixel 9 price.
